about_the_game:
Spike Schema is a 2D action-adventure set across an electromagnetic train rail network in the sky. With your eye-bot companion, explore train stations-turned-military outposts, discover remnant cities, interact with the remaining population, and defeat the Kimble Corporation elites responsible for your sister's disappearance.

- Go fast; the entire world has been finely tuned for speed-running, or explore at your own pace—it's up to you.

- Want more nano currency for that cool upgrade? Simply turn debris into dollars at one of the Nano-Recyclers located in each of the four districts you will visit.

- Pilot war mechs to reach other districts and engage in surprise aerial battles.

- Replayability: Encounter surprises, discover hidden areas, interact with the remaining population, access dozens of upgrades, and explore multiple routes and strategies for victory.

  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 nm AMD APU
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8GHz
